tool_description: Conducts detailed inspection of returned items, assessing condition, completeness, and authenticity to determine appropriate processing actions.

return_request_id.description: Unique identifier for the return request

item_ids.description: List of item identifiers being inspected

inspection_type.description: Type of inspection: basic, detailed, quality_assurance

inspector_id.description: Identifier of the inspector conducting the assessment

packaging_intact.description: Whether original packaging is intact and included

accessories_complete.description: Whether all accessories and components are included

damage_notes.description: Detailed notes about any damage or issues found

photos_taken.description: List of photo filenames for documentation

error_messages: Return request not found: The provided return_request_id does not exist in the system.
Item count mismatch: The number of item_ids must match the number of received_condition entries.
Invalid inspection type: Use one of [basic, detailed, quality_assurance].
Inspector not authorized: The inspector_id is not authorized to perform inspections.
Missing required assessment: packaging_intact and accessories_complete must be specified.
usage: Provide return_request_id, item_ids, inspection_type, inspector_id, received_condition, packaging_intact, and accessories_complete. Optionally add damage_notes and photos_taken for detailed documentation.

inspection_status.description: Overall inspection result: passed, failed, partial

item_assessments.description: Individual assessment result for each item

restockable_items.description: List of item IDs that can be restocked

damaged_items.description: List of item IDs that are damaged or unsellable

inspection_score.description: Numerical score from 0-100 representing overall condition
